functions.name: readHex
functions.docstring: Convert a list of hex strings to binary data.

functions.name: deHexStr
functions.docstring: Convert a hex string to binary data.

functions.name: hexStr
functions.docstring: Convert binary data to a hex string.

functions.name: caselessSort
functions.docstring:
Return a sorted copy of a list. If there are only strings
in the list, it will not consider case.

functions.name: pad
functions.docstring:
Pad byte string 'data' with null bytes until its length is a
multiple of 'size'.

>>> len(pad(b'abcd', 4))
4
>>> len(pad(b'abcde', 2))
6
>>> len(pad(b'abcde', 4))
8
>>> pad(b'abcdef', 4) == b'abcdef\x00\x00'
True
